---
title: "Value box"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
---

```{r}
library(DT)
library(flexdashboard)
```


Row
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Articles per Day

```{r}
articles <- 123
valueBox(articles, icon = "fa-pencil")
```

### Comments per Day

```{r}
comments <- 257
valueBox(comments, icon = "fa-comments", color = "danger")
```

### Spam per Day

```{r}
spam <- 95
valueBox(spam, 
         icon = "fa-trash",
         color = ifelse(spam > 10, "warning", "primary"))
```
